column3: the food was spare and overpriced.   There just wasn't anything here that wowed.  Even the much touted lobster mac and cheese
column4: cooked with elbow noodles instead of the orzo rice Azumu mistakenly uses
column5: lacked sauce and taste.  It was a huge letdown.  The waiter insisted it should end our meal for some reason
column6: and brought it a good 20 minutes after our rolls were finished.  Frankly
column8: but it arrived just before we could.
